message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $10800. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9000?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10200. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9500?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
